programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: Deep in Oregon's back-country sits an 80 acre off-the-grid estate that prepper Curt and his family have designed as a fortress in the event of an economic collapse. Isolation is one of their greatest strengths but the protective measures are endless: a 3,000 square foot greenhouse, a lake with one million gallons of water, infrared cameras and high tech software system - not to mention the children are trained in marksmanship. Now, Curt is working on his next prep - turning a regular truck into a high-speed armored. But while the cameras are rolling, Mother Nature strikes and the entire property is under an immediate threat. In Alaska, Rodney is preparing for a cataclysmic earthquake and the towering tsunami that could follow. With military training, an extensive food supply and an extreme bugout vehicle named "War Machine", Rodney is confident he's on the right track to surviving Doomsday. He's even devised a unique underwater cache system to sustain his family in a resource-scarce community - but concerned the public will be unable to refill scuba tanks after a disaster, Rodney devises a tankless scuba system

programme.title: Neukroćena Amerika
Untamed Americas
programme.desc: Stunning HD cinematography brings us on an epic yet intimate journey through America's Coasts... among the most diverse and dramatic shores on earth. Shaped by three great oceans, America's coastline twists well over 100,000 miles almost from POLE to POLE… the only contiguous landmass to encompass nearly every latitude. We travel from the cold, deep Pacific, to the idyllic warm paradise of the Caribbean sea… from the icy waters of the Arctic, to the southern ocean at the end of the world. America's shores are home to extraordinary life… and awe-inspiring spectacles that could only be found here

programme.title: Nordijska divljina
Nordic Wild
programme.desc: In the remote north of Scandinavia lies a vast treeless wilderness, the Arctic tundra. For much of the year the temperature rarely rises above freezing. But surprisingly there is life here battling against the elements

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: The barriers between the physical and virtual worlds begin to blur as Stephen Hawking and his team of scientists explore the latest innovations

programme.title: Svjetlost na kraju svijeta
Light At The Edge of The World
programme.desc: Wade Davis travels to Mongolia to meet today's members of the ancient nomadic horse cultures who have thrived in the harsh conditions of the Central Asian Steppes for more than two thousand years. Wade's mission is to discover how this ancient culture has made it into the twenty-first Century and to search for the keys to one of man's oldest and deepest bonds - the bond between man and horse. He arrives in central Mongolia at the start of the great Mongolian summer festival, the Naadam, and follows the fortunes of two of the top local horse trainers. One of them seems destined to win everything, but a bitter twist of fate awaits him, as Wade discovers the secrets of the man-horse bond by taking part in the lives of his nomadic horsemen hosts

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: National Geographic Channel's hit series returns with a new episode featuring twelve of the deadliest creatures hiding in the forest. They hunt in the dense underbrush, high in the forest canopy and emerge from underground to do battle on the forest floor. Each one of these animals is equipped with unique adaptations for survival - including deadly weaponry and cunning strategies. But the forest is more than a backdrop in the brutal struggle for survival. Often it plays a key role. Its foliage offers camouflage for stealth attacks, its trees provide a platform from which powerful carnivores launch their assaults and its rich food resources attract plenty of prey. The forest is a complex environment, shaping the lives of every creature in it

programme.title: Posljednji ratni heroji
Last War Heroes
programme.desc: Hitler orders a massive counter-attack in an attempt to cut the Allies in two. But British and Canadian forces press in on Germans forces from the North while American troops close in from the South - creating what is known as the Falaise Pocket. The German army attempts to flee from a gap in the pocket, but they are bombed by Typhoons and finally routed from Normandy

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: In the third episode of Season 3, we profile two unique individuals who fear the end of the world is fast approaching. In Smithville, Tennessee, Tracy Foutch is a father and business owner who fears that a devastating EF5 tornado will rip through his neighborhood. To protect his family, he plans to use his factory as a secret laboratory for his preps where he will create a bug out vehicle that runs off of destruction. In Florida, Dan Rojas is channeling the power of the sun to keep his family alive if devastating lightning storms rip through Tampa. To help recover after a storm that he believes will knock out the power grid, Dan is set to create his biggest prep yet. We join these two men as they take their ordinary lives into uncharted territory, into the world of Doomsday Preppers

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: August 16th, 1987 Northwest Airlines Flight #255 is on the tarmac at Detroit Metropolitan Airport. The pilots are bound for Phoenix, Arizona, but first they have to find their runway. Controllers have given them a last minute change and the pilots are having a hard time locating the entrance to their runway. Finally, 45 minutes behind schedule, the pilots taxi the DC-9 into position. The airplane is soon roaring down the runway at 95 miles an hour (150 kilometers and hour). Captain John Maus pulls back on his control column, but the plane barely manages to get off the ground before it hits a light pole, slams into a building, and disintegrates on a highway. This is the second-deadliest airplane disaster in US history... But can investigators determine what went wrong

programme.title: Sekunde do katastrofe
Seconds from disaster
programme.desc: It's a regular morning in the lively town of Amagasaki when a busy commuter train derails and crashes into an apartment building, killing over a hundred passengers and trapping hundreds more inside

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Aarathi Prasad road-tests Boston Dynamics' incredible animal-inspired robots

programme.title: Svjetlost na kraju svijeta
Light At The Edge of The World
programme.desc: They have no word for time, or history. But they are the keepers of the oldest continuing civilization on earth -a visionary culture that predates the Pyramids, the Bible, even the end of the last ice age. The Aborigines of Australia see themselves as the guardians of the world itself-a world they sing into being every day. Journey into the Australian bush with host Wade Davis, as he travels the mystical trails of the "Songlines" to unlock the secrets of a mysterious way of life known as the "Dreaming

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: The Desert and Grassland's Deadly Dozen begins with the world's fastest rattler: the sidewinder. Then we travel to Africa for a close up look at one of the world's deadliest - and tiniest - arachnids, the six-eyed sand spider. Next, the beautiful and highly toxic zebra snake. On the open savannahs, three top predators rule the plains by working together - the African lion, the cheetah, and the spotted hyena. Next we take a closer look at three deadly deceivers, the desert death adder, the western coral snake, and the African wild dog. But humans take dangerous risks when they ignore the boundaries set by massive plant eaters - black rhinos and American bison. Finally, the hour concludes with one man's firsthand account of what it's like to face down the largest creature walking the Earth: the African Elephant

programme.title: Tigar u bijegu
programme.desc: "Tiger on the Run" is a natural history documentary following a young tiger in India, that's been forced out of his home territory by another male, and has to struggle for survival. The film promises to address the issue of habitat destruction and interaction of tigers and humans caused by the shrinking habitat

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: This episode welcomes viewers to the deadly world of the most armed and dangerous gangsters, assassins, and con artists of the animal kingdom. A gang of flesh-eating fish take down a river rat; the Bengal tiger shows just how to get the job done—alone; ta red-back spider lures, then eats her date; a femme fatale like no other, mama brown bear goes head to head with another bear to protect her young; and a pack of killer whales demonstrate how they live up to their name

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: Golden sands, warm crystal-clear water, palm trees… it sounds like heaven, but there can be a dark side to paradise. Living in the world’s most idyllic places is no holiday for many animals—this is fiercely contested real estate, and the hunting grounds of some truly terrifying and deadly creatures. The world’s most exotic destinations can be a Predator Paradise

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom a covert assassin emerged. Lurking in the shadows, ready to pounce at lighting speeds, he searches for his next meal. He fights for survival, battling his foes. He is an animal ninja and possesses the skills to kill: speed, stealth, agility, patience and weapons. In the next hour, the world’s deadliest animals will use their jaw dropping talents to fight to live another day. From stealthy cats to patient seals, giant centipedes to kick-boxing kangaroos, these animals will amaze us all on World’s Deadliest: Animal Ninja Warriors

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: This episode welcomes viewers to the deadly world of the most feudal families, almighty monarchs, territorial clans, and awesome armies of the animal kingdom. Holding the crown for the largest land carnivore in the world, polar bears feast like kings, eating all the seals they can. Giraffes go head to head in epic neck jousting battles over lady giraffes; sand-tiger sharks—wage wars in utero; and wildebeest warriors get the upper hand—or hoof—in one of the greatest wildlife migrations on earth. Watch how these creatures and the rest of our species duke it out in the World’s Deadliest: Game of Thrones

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: In science fiction, lethal morphing Transformers may be a figment of the imagination, but here on Earth, beware, transformers are for real! Whether it’s to hunt or protect itself against predators, they’re spine-chilling killing machines ready to mutate in surprising and amazing ways. Some of the world’s deadliest animals use their talents to transform in astonishing ways. From colour changing to shape shifting, getting fierce, turning up the heat, fooling their prey or simply letting it fly, these animals do anything it takes to survive on World’s Deadliest: Transformers

programme.title: Ubojice s obale jezera
programme.desc: Deep within Africa's heart lies the Zambezi Valley. At the center of this wilderness lies a great lake, an Eden like nowhere else on earth. Here we meet three males lions; Takunda, Gombwe and Zindoga. They are coming into their prime, but still have much to prove

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: K9s4Cops, a charitable organization that buys canines for police departments who cant afford them, stops by Vohne Liche Kennels with a client looking for a new dog. When the guys discover this dog must be able to work in the water, its up to Bobby and Luther to get the dog ready, or VLK may lose all of K9s4Cops future business. Meanwhile, Kenny, Danny and KC work with Charlie Fourkiller, a Kokomo Police Officer training to be a dog handler. Kenny is pleased with Charlies progress during bite training, and invites him to come along on a drug bust to gain some real-life experience

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Kenny is interested in growing an Executive Protection branch at VLK to supply dogs for celebrities, athletes, and other high-end clients. He thinks he has found the right guy for the job in Wade Morrel, but Wades arrogant attitude could come back to bite him literally. Meanwhile, Kenny gets a list of 28 dogs that his trainers claim need to be returned to Europe

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: There are some places on this planet that are so wild that if you go there...you may not come out ALIVE

programme.title: Tajanstveni majmuni Shangri-La
programme.desc: Representing the meticulous and ambitious work of an all-Chinese film company led by award-winning filmmaker, Xi Zhinong, this spectacular film is the true story of a family of Yunnan snub-nosed monkeys living in the highest forests in the world. Only recently discovered, snub-nosed monkeys are hauntingly beautiful primates, different and gentler than others of their kind. Elfin-like, they seem both childlike and wise beyond their years(c)

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Deep in the rainforest of Nicaragua, Zeb Hogan is on a mission to track down a powerful predator- the giant tarpon. Tarpon are usually found in the sea, but there are stories of 300-pound giants lurking here - in the largest lake in Central America - and a secluded jungle river that could hold the biggest monster of them all(c)

programme.title: Divlja Rusija
programme.desc: Synonymous with punishing cold, parts of Siberia bake at 40 degrees Celsius. Lurking in the forests of Siberia's Yakutia region with a face like a kangaroo and vampire's teeth is the musk deer

programme.title: Ubojice s obale jezera
programme.desc: Deep within Africa's heart lies the Zambezi Valley. At the center of this wilderness lies a great lake, an Eden like nowhere else on earth. Here we meet three males lions; Takunda, Gombwe and Zindoga. They are coming into their prime, but still have much to prove

programme.title: Tigar u bijegu
programme.desc: "Tiger on the Run" is a natural history documentary following a young tiger in India, that's been forced out of his home territory by another male, and has to struggle for survival. The film promises to address the issue of habitat destruction and interaction of tigers and humans caused by the shrinking habitat

programme.title: Najubojitija svjetska trojka
programme.desc: These are the predators that prove that when it comes to hunting prey, size doesn’t always matter. These are the World's Deadliest: Little Killers miniscule menaces with the ability to take down prey several times their own size(c)

programme.title: Tajne kraljevske kobre
programme.desc: COBRA is an unprecedented journey into the natural history of the wild King Cobra-following them into their world-revealing what they do, where they go, and who they interact with-when we are not around. And surprisingly, the people of India are very much a part of the story. Early evidence suggests that kings might be more intertwined with humans than previously thought., making this project more important than ever.1 It's a close and personal look into the secret life of the King-and the best chance we have of ensuring the survival of this legendary snake

programme.title: Ubojice s obale jezera
programme.desc: Deep within Africa's heart lies the Zambezi Valley. At the center of this wilderness lies a great lake, an Eden like nowhere else on earth. Here we meet three males lions; Takunda, Gombwe and Zindoga. They are coming into their prime, but still have much to prove

programme.title: Tigar u bijegu
programme.desc: "Tiger on the Run" is a natural history documentary following a young tiger in India, that's been forced out of his home territory by another male, and has to struggle for survival. The film promises to address the issue of habitat destruction and interaction of tigers and humans caused by the shrinking habitat

programme.title: Tajanstveni majmuni Shangri-La
programme.desc: Representing the meticulous and ambitious work of an all-Chinese film company led by award-winning filmmaker, Xi Zhinong, this spectacular film is the true story of a family of Yunnan snub-nosed monkeys living in the highest forests in the world. Only recently discovered, snub-nosed monkeys are hauntingly beautiful primates, different and gentler than others of their kind. Elfin-like, they seem both childlike and wise beyond their years

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: There are fish, …and then there are FISH. Lurking in the murky depths of the world's great waterways are bizarre giants-specimens of such enormous proportion and odd appearance they boggle the mind. In his quest to save the world's big fish, aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan has wrangled some of the biggest freshwater fish in the world. In this episode, we follow him as he goes in search of one of North America's toothiest and most misunderstood monster fish: the alligator gar. These bizarre creatures reach lengths of 10 feet and have a mouthful of razor-sharp teeth. They've disappeared from their former northern ranges, and are now disappearing from the bayous and marshes of the southern United States. They're under assault because of their fearsome appearance, rumors of attacks on humans, and the belief by some anglers who believe they devour game fish. We join Zeb Hogan as he comes face to face with an alligator gar and discovers if the myths about this monster are true

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: North America is home to an array of wild creatures…creatures that have roamed the continent for millennia. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of animals, insects, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predator skills. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying into their inner sanctums. From the painted deserts to the coastal waterways, to the dense forests, to our own back yards…they creep, crawl, and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when we reach the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. For this superlative denizen of the natural world, we not only go in depth to examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed it to survive and thrive, but we also hear from someone whos met it first hand, and lived to tell the story. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are North Americas Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Timbavati: Lavlji ep
programme.desc: Some of Africa's most formidable predators live in family groups. We follow the lives of three of these - lion, wild dog and hyena - as they cross paths in Timbavati, near Kruger. The Timbavati pride is a newly formed coalition of three lion brothers, three lionesses and their newborn cubs. In comparison, the Sohebeles have lost their father and their territory. The 5 youngsters are left to their own devices. We compare the structure of the lions' family group to a pack of wild dogs that visit the Timbavati, and the local hyena clan, lead by a powerful matriarch. All three families work in very different ways with one purpose- survival

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje u Africi
programme.desc: Lions get most of the attention but there are many cats that kill. Their size, camouflage and hunting strategy may vary but they're all deadly. You’d think there is nothing more exciting than watching a pride of lions moving in for the kill but there are others just as fascinating, agile and dangerous. In the quiet of the night no prey will hear them coming

programme.title: Fantomska mačka
programme.desc: Film maker Christian Baumeister travels through the Pantanal in search of South America's largest and most elusive big cat, the jaguar

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Kenny meets with his GM Dennis, who trained a dog named Max to find cell phones. A cell-phone-sniffing dog can keep inmates from conducting activity outside of the jail on a phone that isnt monitored. In order to sell this dog, the VLK guys have to prove to Warren Hall, a representative from an inmate phone provider, that Max can find phones in a functioning jail facility

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Kenny and Danny travel to Terre Haute, IN to run live fire drills with the Terre Haute PD. During the training, one dog lashes out against a handler and bites his arm. Kenny takes the dog back to VLK to determine if the dog has issues with live fire. Meanwhile, Luther must train four green dogs to detect explosives for a T.E.D.D. class arriving next week. If thats not enough pressure, Kenny decides the gang cant go "Turtling" unless Luther finishes his training

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: In the darkest corners of the world, deadly predators watch and wait for their next, unsuspecting prey. Armed with special nighttime powers, including extra-strength night vision and hypersensitive hearing, these creatures are anatomically designed to succeed in the dark

programme.title: Pitonaton
programme.desc: PYTHONATHON will chronicle the Florida Fish & Wildlife Conservation Commission's (FWC) latest effort to control the exploding Burmese python populations - a 4 week long hunting season on the invasive snakes with cash prizes to the hunters who bring in the largest and the most snakes - by following hunting teams as they try to stop the invasion and win cash prizes

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Fish biologist and conservation expert, Zeb Hogan, travels to Thailand on a mission to uncover why this country is home to so many giant freshwater fish species.12 On the surface this tropical paradise would seem like a fish haven, but trouble is brewing. The conditions in Thailand are so perfect that it is enticing breeders to raise foreign species3, and here they are able to thrive, grow and breed on their own. This could mean trouble for Thailands native fish… and its not the only thing that is causing their decline. To get the answers to his mission Zeb travels across Thailand to identify as many of the countrys monster fish species as possible, both native and foreign, assess their status in the wild and meet the locals who can help these giants survive, but at what cost

programme.title: Divlja Rusija
programme.desc: Located on Russia's far eastern edge is the stark peninsula of Kamchatka - a surprising place where volcanoes create a land of fire and ice

programme.title: Timbavati: Lavlji ep

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: The animal world is full of predators who can kill in the blink of an eye. These are the World's Deadliest: Speed Kills -- and they dish out death like fast food. From the fleet-footed cheetah, to the stargazer fish that swallows prey in a tenth of a second, to the venomous black mamba -- the fastest and deadliest snake in the world -- Speed Kills puts you in the line of fire to show you the insane speeds at which some creatures kill. Youll witness animal death strikes so fast, they cant even be captured in slow motion

programme.title: Zmije u gradu
programme.desc: After a quiet winter, snake bounty hunters, Simon and Nadine Keys are desperate for work. Its a shaky start to the snake season as Simon is attacked by a cobra and wrestles with a huge Black Mamba

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Dr. Zeb Hogan travels down under to find an aquatic Australian icon - the Murray Cod - and to uncover why it has virtually disappeared from its namesake waterway - the Murray River. The race is on as scientists, conservationists and anglers join forces to keep these legendary monster fish alive

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Australia, a continent unto itself…home to scores of creatures found nowhere else in the world. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of animals, insects, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predatory skills. Brilliantly adapted, beautiful to observe, they enthrall and amaze us. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying to their inner sanctums. From the Great Barrier Reef to the Outback, to the urban jungle, they creep crawl and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. To best understand these animals, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed them to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met them first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Australias Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Stvoreni za ubijanje
programme.desc: Lions are 400 pounds of muscle, teeth, and claw. Lion cubs are 4 pounds of blind, toothless, fluff-built not to kill, but to breastfeed. Built for the Kill: Lion follows the transformation of a helpless cub into an accomplished killer, exposing real life and death struggles in dramatic second-by-second detail

programme.title: Smrtni neprijatelji
programme.desc: In Africa, no other herbivore rivals the buffalo with its brute force and collective strategy; honed over millennia in an evolutionary blood feud with the ultimate predator. For most of the year the breeding herd fends off relentless attacks from the resident lion pride. Then, when the dry season sucks water away from the grasslands, they migrate beyond the reach of the killers, but risk starvation. Life is a perpetual Catch 22 for the buffaloes where payment for fresh water and sweet grasses is made in blood

programme.title: Prokletstvo Oak Islanda
programme.desc: Oak Island šumovit je otok na južnoj obali Nove Škotske koji već više od dva stoljeća opčinjava lovce na blago

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: Serija "Drvosječe" na pola je sezone, a pritisak da što bolje okončaju sezonu veći je nego ikad. Na Pacifičkom sjeverozapadu ekipa "Rygaard Logging" počela je upisivati sve veći broj klada zahvaljujući DJ-u Jeremiahu, ali danas… Nije se pojavio

programme.title: Neustrašivi aljaški vozači
programme.desc: Rover je iznenadio svoje kolege vozače svojim povratkom u utrku te pomrsio strategiju ostalih ekipa. A Butch i Bill kreću punom brzinom ne bi li ponovno "katapultirali" "Ratni vagon" među vodeće ekipe

programme.title: Kamioni na ledu
programme.desc: Darrell i Lisa skupljaju snagu za iznimno rizičan zadatak. Todd nailazi na poteškoće dok se nadmeće za posao s vladom, a zbog problema s kamionom za vozača ekipe "Polar" Arta Burkea sezona bi mogla završiti

programme.title: Američki "skupljači"
American Pickers
programme.desc: Vođa grupe "The Black Keys", Dan Auerbach, odlučio je Mikeu pokvariti planove o prodaji starinske gitare. Sammy se teško odvaja od predmeta koji predstavljaju obiteljsku povijest

programme.title: Izgubljeni u prijenosu
programme.desc: Ova emisija prati dvojicu automobilskih stručnjaka i prijatelja, Rutledgea Wooda i Kylea Pettyja, legendu NASCAR-a, u potrazi za neobičnim automobilima kojima bi uz malo ljubavi i pažnje mogli vratiti stari sjaj i slavu

programme.title: Američke restauracije
programme.desc: Ricka posjećuje pjevač i tekstopisac Jason Mraz, dobitnik Grammyja, i donosi natpis koji želi obnoviti u sjećanje na pokojnog djeda. Hoće li Rick odsvirati prave note ili će pjevati tužaljke

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice: Južna Afrika
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Neobični i predivni artefakti iz južne Afrike s očaravajućom povijesti stižu u zalagaonicu sa svih strana dok vlasnik Roy Peretz i njegovi partneri Liel i Eytan svaki dan izvode vratolomije dok pregovaraju za najbolju cijenu
programme.category: Prepusti to meni, Gangsters and Guitars

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: Kad nestane kamion koji je prevozio cjepivo protiv gripe vrijedno 1,3 milijuna dolara, u pomoć pozivaju lovce na kamione. Nađu li kamion, zaradit će 3500 dolara. No vrijeme je ključan čimbenik jer, ako hladnjak u kamionu ne radi, cjepiva će propasti

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: Neprestane razmirice umalo dovedu do razlaza ekipa koje tragaju za nestalim kamionom "Peterbild" koji je prevozio automobilske dijelove u Detroit. Ekipa koja vrati kamion osvojit će 3800 dolara, ali prvo mora svladati rupe na cesti

programme.title: Gorštaci
programme.desc: Posjet Tomova sina Chada pođe po zlu, a Martyjev let s planinskog lanca Revelation Mountains kasni

programme.title: Borci s morskim psima
programme.desc: Chris Fisher i njegova ekipa odlaze u zaljev koji je poznat kao mjesto na kojem obitavaju morski psi veličine kamiona. Budući da im vrijeme curi, ekipa radi danonoćno i ugrožava život kako bi uhvatili goleme morske pse u gluho doba noći(c)

programme.title: Neustrašivi aljaški vozači
programme.desc: Butch i Bill odlučili su se napokon približiti ekipi "Lower Forty-Eighters". Carl se i dalje bori s izmučenim "Super Džipom" u nadi da još ima dovoljno snage da ostanu među vodećima(c)

programme.title: Kamioni na ledu
programme.desc: Darrell i Lisa skupljaju snagu za iznimno rizičan zadatak. Todd nailazi na poteškoće dok se nadmeće za posao s vladom, a zbog problema s kamionom za vozača ekipe "Polar" Arta Burkea sezona bi mogla završiti

programme.title: Američki "skupljači"
American Pickers
programme.desc: Budući da se krov iznad golemog obiteljskog skladišta počeo urušavati, skupljač iz Kentuckyja mora prodati sve što može dok nije prekasno

programme.title: Bitka za skladište
Storage Wars
programme.desc: Nova dražba održava se u Riversideu, gdje će Jarroda i Brandi dočekati mnoštvo novih, ali izrazito nestrpljivih konkurenata. Dok se oni natječu za skladište puno klasičnih, kućanskih predmeta, Barry kupuje 'tajanstveni prtljažnik'. Darrell pronalazi kutiju punu zanimljivih knjiga koje, ako su vrijedne, mogu podebljati njegov bankovni račun za pozamašan iznos(c)
programme.category: dokumentarni reality, Young with a Gun

programme.title: Drevni izvanzemaljci
programme.desc: Jesu li kristalne lubanje skupa prevara? Ili imaju veliku i možda izvanzemaljsku moć? U ovoj epizodi istražuje se vjerojatno najkontroverzniji drevni predmet

programme.desc: U današnjoj epizodi kupci će krenuti u potragu za antikvitetima i industrijskom robom. Jarrod i Brandi razveselit će pronalazak antiknog stalka za vinske boce, Dave i Barry će si u međuvremenu testirati znanje o čudnim stvarima, dok Darrell vjeruje da će ga usrećiti skladište puno goriva

programme.title: Špediterski ratovi
programme.desc: Jenny pokušava izvršiti "divlji" zadatak, prevesti šest bengalskih tigrova, dok Marc pokazuje kreativnost s kamionetom i prikolicom nakon što ne uspije dostaviti hrpu mitoloških figura u stambenu četvrt

programme.title: Špediterski ratovi
programme.desc: Nakon što je na glazbenom festivalu osvojio disko robota koji riga vatru, Chrisa Kikelhana ubrzo obuzme nostalgija za danima kad je imao lakše zadatke. Dusty je na svojoj koži iskusio kako se ponaša plemstvo kad mu dođe klijent s neobičnim zahtjevom

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: Gabe kudi mamurnog žutokljunca, ali Jason se ne slaže s njegovim stilom vođenja posla. Borba za premoć na rijeci i dalje bjesni dok se članovi ekipe Chapman međusobno svađaju, a Dreadknotsi se vode onom "zavadi pa vladaj"

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice: Južna Afrika
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Neobični i predivni artefakti iz južne Afrike s očaravajućom povijesti stižu u zalagaonicu sa svih strana dok vlasnik Roy Peretz i njegovi partneri Liel i Eytan svaki dan izvode vratolomije dok pregovaraju za najbolju cijenu

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice: Južna Afrika
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Komplet opreme s metlom za vještice početnice baca čini u začaranom nastavku u kojem nam predstavljaju markicu "Penny Black" iz 1840. i dalekozor iz Burskog rata

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: S parkirališta su ukrali kamion pun alkohola u vrijednosti od 120.000 dolara te počinje utrka za nagradu od 3300 dolara. Tko će prvi pronaći kamion? Big T. i Bek moraju skrenuti s puta jer im je zbog divljanja na cesti vozač poslao poruku upomoć

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: Iz sjedišta "Platinum Truckinga" ukrali su dva kamiona s energetskim napitcima vrijednim 45.000 dolara. Čini se da je umiješan netko iznutra. Tri ekipe ulaze u otvorenu borbu: nagrada za svaki kamion iznosi 5000 dolara, što je pozamašna svota

programme.title: Gorštaci
programme.desc: Gorštaka Charlieja Tuckera, bivšeg drvosječu, napustila je sreća u šumama sjevernog Mainea gdje se temperatura spustila ispod ništice kad je zbog početničke pogreške umalo ostao bez svega

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: U Washingtonu Gabe ostaje bez svoje titule "Kralja planine" koju mu oduzima nova ekipa. No u pomoć mu priskače neočekivani član obitelji. U Chapmanu se najnoviji član ekipe bori za život

programme.title: Ljudi iz močvare
programme.desc: I dok hladno vrijeme ugrožava sezonu lova na aligatore, dva hrabra lovca pokušavaju prevući svoj čamac preko uskog rukavca kako bi dostigli toplije vode

programme.title: Gorštaci
programme.desc: Ova emisija prikazuje različite pojedince od Apalačkog gorja preko Stjenjaka do Aljaske i prati ih dok se hvataju ukoštac sa zimom kako bi došli do potrepština i novca koji su im potrebni da prežive najhladnije mjesece u godini

programme.title: Američki "skupljači"
American Pickers
programme.desc: Dečki u Pennsylvaniji traže dva starinska "Harleyja", a Frank dobiva više od očekivanog jer se svidio skupljaču motocikala

programme.title: Bitka za skladište
Storage Wars
programme.desc: Opće je poznato da je kalifornijski Perris avanturistički grad pa se kupci skladišnih jedinica nadaju da će pametno odigrati na audiciji i kupiti puno vrijedne opreme za planinarenje, kampiranje i skakanje s padobranom. Tko će od njih otići kući s novcem, a tko s kamionom smeća
programme.category: dokumentarni reality, Makings of a Mogul

programme.title: Bitka za skladište

programme.desc: Nova dražba skladišnih jedinica održava se u Torranceu, kalifornijskom 'antiknom' gradiću. Dave i Jarrod natječu se za skladište u kojem je parkiran Jaguar, Barry kupuje skladište puno raznih stvari samo kako bi zadovoljio svoj avanturistički duh, dok Brandi izaziva Jarroda na dvoboj spolova

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Rick uokviri potpisanu reprodukciju poznate fotografije Ansela Adamsa "Monolith, The Face of Half Dome". Rick pokušava zaraditi kad u zalagaonicu donesu novčić od jednog centa iz 1791. g. U nastavku Corey primjećuje da mu Rick stalno uzma stvari

Australski "skupljači

programme.title: Skladišni ratovi: New York
Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: Ekipa se vratila u Brooklyn gdje Joe P pogađa u sridu s najmodernijim uređajima, Chris i Tad draže nepce kušanjem vina, a Candy i Courtney primijenjuju novu strategiju ponude

programme.title: Skladišni ratovi: New York

programme.title: Napoleon - pohod na Rusiju
Napoleon: The Campaign of Russia
programme.desc: Napoleon je izgubio polovicu svojih trupa prije dolaska u Moskvu. Konačni neuspjeh bio je prelazak Berezine gdje se ostatak njegove vojske utopio, a on je pobjegao i ostavio svoje ljude. Godine 1812. Napoleon je okupio vojsku od 600 000 vojnika, pripadnika 24 različita naroda, najveću vojsku ikad stvorenu. Protivno savjetima svojih najbližih savjetnika, maršira prema Moskvi odlučan u namjeri da pokori Rusiju. 172 dana poslije, Napoleon se povlači i iza sebe ostavlja 400 000 svojih vojnika, mrtvih ili zarobljenih. Ova dokumentarna drama prikazuje ovu najznamenitiju i najlegendarniju vojnu kampanju. Također pokušava otkriti zašto je Napoleon odlučio osvojiti Rusiju, kako je najveći vođa tog vremena mogao počiniti toliko strateških pogrešaka i kako su ga doživljavali Rusi, drugi europski vladari i njegove vlastite trupe

programme.title: Park za sva godišnja doba

programme.title: Park za sva godišnja doba

programme.title: Pressing
programme.category: U Pressingu pitamo sve u vaše ime. Udarne regionalne teme sa gostima koji imaju odgovore na pitanja. Gledaoci mogu putem društvenih mreža postavljati pitanja i iskazati svoja mišljenja o svemu.

programme.title: Indijska bolnica
programme.desc: Ovaj dokumentarni serijal baca novo svjetlo na indijsko društvo. U šest jednosatnih epizoda prikazuju se složenost i nedoumice savremene Indije kroz živote pacijenata i medicinskog osoblja u bolničkom kompleksu 'Narayana Hrudayalaya' u Bangaloreu. U trećoj epizodi pitamo se može li Indija postati prva zemlja na svijetu koja razdvaja zdravstvo od bogatstva

programme.title: Regioskop - Čistači
programme.desc: U Grčkoj, državi koja se suočava sa finansijskim i socijalnim krahom, neonacistička stranka Zlatna zora postala je glavni „ispušni ventil za gnjev javnosti. Na prethodnim izborima jedva su se registrovali, a na onim iz 2012. dobili su čak 7% glasova birača i prvi put ušli u grčki parlament. Film prati grupu članova Zlatne zore tokom njihove predizborne kampanje u centru Atine. Njihova politika mržnje, prezira i potrage za „žrtvenim jarcima redovna je na ulicama grčkog glavnog grada. Nemilosrdni su u svom lovu na „krivce za probleme u Grčkoj. Trebaju im žrtve

programme.title: Širom svijeta
programme.desc: Metode u istragama koje koriste izraelske unutrašnje sigurnosne službe u najmanju ruku su kontroverzne. Izraelska unutrašnja služba sigurnosti Shin Bet, ili Shabak, jedna je od tri glavne službe sigurnosnog aparata. Kroz lične ispovijesti dva bivša Shin Bet pritvorenika, Al Jazeera World ispituje kontroverzne organizacijske metode, ovlasti i historiju te službe(c)

programme.title: Moj život - SATNE
programme.desc: Svakog mjeseca nekoliko stotina kontejnera elektronskog otpada iz zapadnih zemalja stiže u Agbogbloshie, nekadašnje ribarsko mjesto u blizini Accre, glavnog i najvećeg grada Gane, uzrokujući zagađenja i uništenja okoliša. Ta se zemlja ubraja među najveća svjetska odlagališta elektronskog otpada(c)

programme.title: Jači od riječi
programme.desc: U sedmici posvećenoj gluhonijemim osobama Al Jazeera prikazuje film o životu gluhonijemih u Palestini. Kako žive, imaju li pomoć od države, koliko su zakonski ravnopravni sa osobama koje čuju? Kako se integrišu u društvo? Kako doživljavaju opsadu i život u ratnom okruženju

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: Može li domicilno stanovništvo Rapanui na Uskršnjem otoku, koje je polinezijskog porijekla, dobiti bitku za nezavisnost od Čilea, kako bi zaštitili svoju zemlju i kulturu? Njihovi poznati monolitni Moai kipovi simbol su zagonetne prošlosti ovog dijela planete Zemlje(c)

programme.title: Širom svijeta
programme.desc: U poređenju s drugim telekomunikacijskim tehnologijama, sateliti su najsigurniji. Broj zahtjeva za korištenjem usluga vještačkih satelita u ogromnom je porastu. Danas je bez njih nemoguće zamisliti život. Njihov nestanak značio bi i obustavljanje međunarodnih razgovora, prestanak rada satelitskih TV kanala, kao i telekomunikacijskog sektora. U saobraćaju bismo se odrekli prednosti Globalnog sistema za pozicioniranje. Međutim, u primjeni te tehnologije postoje vlade pojedinih zemalja koje ometanjem satelitskog signala žele uvesti cenzuru. U današnjem svijetu sistem telekomunikacija i satelitskog prijenosa signala u stalnom je porastu. Kako i na koji način se ta tehnologija razvijala, saznat ćemo u novom izdanju serijala ' Širom svijeta'

programme.title: Većina počinje ovdje
programme.desc: Film prati šest mladih ljudi iz bivših jugoslovenskih republika dok putujući regionom istražuju uticaj ratova s kraja prošlog vijeka na njihove živote i budućnost

programme.title: Lica Kine
programme.desc: Fengjiang se nalazi južno od Šangaja. Taj grad poznat je po najvećem odlagališu električne i elektroničke opreme u Kini. Iz godine u godinu ono raste, a prema posljednjem izvještaju UN-a, predviđa se da će do 2020. ta vrsta otpada iz Kine biti uvećana za čak 400%. U filmu pratimo svakodnevicu običnih radnika u tim odlagalištima, kao i na koji način obavljaju posao te kakvi su im radni uvjeti

programme.title: Moj život
programme.desc: Pratimo ambicioznu tinejdžerku Suzete Sangula koja se bori za prava žena u Mozambiku

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Primorje i planinski predjeli spajaju se u ovoj epizodi u kojoj čujemo priče Crnogorca profesora IVANA L. ZUBERA i Slovenca JURE FRANKA. Obojica vrhunski sportaši govore kako je bilo živjeti u Italiji gdje je gospodin Zuber trenirao plivače velike Rome ili u Japanu u kojem je skijaš i osvajač olimpijskog srebra Franko dugo godina radio kao glasnogovornik. Govore nam o tome koliko su njihove zemlje imale pozitivnog ili negativnog utjecaja na njihov povratak, a sve to vodeći nas kroz sunčane predjele Herceg-Novog ili kroz šarmantnu jezgru slovenskog gradića Radovljice

programme.title: Vrhovi Balkana
programme.desc: Osim Julijskih, svoje mjesto u srcima Slovenaca svakako imaju i Kamniško-Savinjske Alpe. Smještene na granici s Austrijom, te su planine ljupka poveznica dviju zemalja. Zašto je planinarenje u kulturi odrastanja gotovo svakog Slovenca, otkriva Bojan Rotovnik, predsjednik Planinarskog saveza Slovenije, koji je s 55.000 članova najmoćnija nevladina organizacija u zemlji. Na najviši vrh Grintovec David i Polona penju se bosi. Idući s njima, saznajemo da su čak osnovali sportsko društvo „Bosa noga, čiji članovi smatraju da im cipele samo smetaju. Davo Karničar, jedini čovjek na svijetu koji je bez prekida skijao čak s vrha Mount Everesta, otkriva planove kojima iznova pomjera granice ljudskih mogućnosti. Kako ptice vide Alpe, opisuje nam Matevž Lenarčič, svjetski rekorder u letu ultralakim avionima. Na Kamniško-Savinjskim Alpama sagrađen je i prvi futuristički bivak, pokazujemo ekskluzivne snimke njegove gradnje i pogled koji se pamti cijeli život(c)

programme.title: Tragom Putinove Rusije
programme.desc: Vladimir Putin, predsjednik koji suverno vlada Rusijom, slovi za najmoćnijeg čovjeka u toj zemlji i za jednog od najutjecajnih političara na planeti. U četiri dijela serijala, donosimo priče iz te zemlje, gdje smo se na mjestu događaja uvjerili u moć Putinove Rusije. Razgovarali smo s mnogim Rusima i postavljali pitanje zašto većina voli Putina, glasa za njega i šta zapravo stanovnici žele za sebe i svoju zemlju, te kakva je uloga Putina u tome? U drugom dijelu serijala istražujemo kako ekonomska kriza potresa Rusiju? Kako se građani Rusije snalaze u novonastaloj situaciji, ko je odgovoran za ekonomsku krizu i pad vrijednosti rublje? Je li za to odgovoran Zapad, zbog uvođenja sankcija Rusiji kao posljedice njene uloge u sukobu u Ukrajini? Treba li odgovornost tražiti u padu cijena nafte na globalnom svjetskom tržištu, korupciji ili zaostavštini komunističke privrede

programme.title: Nedjelja 13.
programme.desc: Dokumentarni film «Nedjelja 13.» se bavi događajima na nikada odigranoj utakmici Dinamo - Crvena Zvezda prije tačno 25 godina, 13. maja 1990. godine. Prikazali smo šta se događalo na maksimirskom stadionu, ali i van njega uoči početka utakmice. Svoje poglede i sjećanja vezano za ovaj događaj iznose mjerodavne osobe - navijači s obje strane (Dinamovi i navijači Crvene Zvezde), službenici (pripadnici tadašnjih milicijskih jedinica, voditelji osiguranja same utakmice, predstavnici klubova), ali i igrači obje momčadi. Namjera filma je predstaviti svjedočanstva učesnika događaja, od kojih većina, bar do danas, javnosti nije poznata

programme.title: Većina počinje ovdje
programme.desc: Film prati šest mladih ljudi iz bivših jugoslovenskih republika dok putujući regionom istražuju uticaj ratova s kraja prošlog vijeka na njihove živote i budućnost

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Stručnjak za umjetnu inteligenciju i bivši uposlenik Googlea Igor Trajkovski i glumac svjetskog glasa i vječni boem Rade Šerbedžija govore o povratku zemlji i porodici, kao i ulozi koju mediji mogu imati u tom procesu. Igor nam opisuje kako je, baveći se idejom povratka u Makedoniju, za vlastite potrebe napravio news-agregator kako bi dobio što objektivniju sliku stanja u državi, a danas je to najpopularniji internetski portal u državi s tendencijom da osvoji i regiju. Na sebi svojstven način, Rade govori o putovanjima po svijetu i svojim mnogim "domovima", te nas, sa kćerkom Ninom, vodi tamo gdje se najviše osjeća "kod kuće" - uz kamin u prelijepoj istarskoj kamenoj kući

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Primorje i planinski predjeli spajaju se u ovoj epizodi u kojoj čujemo priče Crnogorca profesora IVANA L. ZUBERA i Slovenca JURE FRANKA. Treba li odgovornost tražiti u padu cijena nafte na globalnom svjetskom tržištu, korupciji ili zaostavštini komunističke privrede

programme.title: Lica Kine
programme.desc: Planine Qinling protežu se na više od 1500 kilometara u kineskoj provinciji Shaanxi. Razdvajaju sjever i jug zemlje. Mnoga sela u regiji, koja se smatraju kolijevkom kineske civilizacije, nalaze se na velikoj nadmorskoj visini, a neka i na više od 3000 metara. U toj planinskoj regiji pratimo tim državnih službenika koji putuju na motorima u pokušaju da se i u tim udaljenim planinskim zajednicama riješe nagomilani problemi u skladu sa zakonom

programme.title: Čuvari tajni
programme.desc: Bivši šefovi izraelske agencije za unutrašnju sigurnost, poznate kao Shin Bet, prvi put se javno osvrću na svoje postupke i odluke te iznose svoje viđenje situacije. Od Šestodnevnog rata iz 1967. godine Izrael nije postigao uspjeh u preobrazbi razarajuće vojne pobjede u trajni mir. Tokom cijelog tog perioda ovi šefovi Shin Beta nalazili su se u samom centru procesa donošenja odluka u vezi sa pitanjima koja se tiču sigurnosti. Usko su sarađivali sa svim izraelskim premijerima. Njihove procjene i shvatanja su imali, a i dalje imaju, veliki utjecaj na izraelsku politiku. U razgovoru rasvjetljavaju kontroverzu u vezi sa okupacijom u periodu nakon Šestodnevnog rata

programme.title: Regioskop - Presuda u Mađarskoj
programme.desc: Filmska ekipa je tri godine pratila suđenje članovima mađarske kriminalne bande, optuženim za rasno motivisana ubistva šest Roma, uključujući i djecu. Policiji je trebalo više od godinu da uhapsi osumnjičene, a cijeli slučaj je predugo trajao - uglavnom zbog nedostatka dokaza i ogromnih policijskih propusta

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: U ovosedmičnom izdanju serijala 'Priče s istoka' putujemo u Kinu gdje istražujemo tradiciju u vezi sa odgajanjem djece i običaj da mlade majke ostaju u kući mjesec dana nakon rođenja djeteta. Naša reporterka boravi s majkama nakon poroda i upoznaje se s tim drevnim kineskim običajem

programme.title: Ljudi i moć
programme.desc: Gledamo iza kulisa kolumbijskih pobunjenika, dok se bliži kraj 50. godine sukoba

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Kako se osjeća rođeni Argentinac koji je živio u Čileu, a naših je korijena, ili rođena Sarajka koja se nakon Amerike, Francuske i Njemačke skrasila u Zagrebu? Gdje im je dom, koji je njihov nacionalni identitet? Na ova pitanja odgovaraju ESTEBAN STEVAN MILOVIĆ i TATJANA GALIĆ. Stevan je rođen u Argentini. Roditelji su mu iz Bosne i Hercegovine i Hrvatske. Dolazeći s porodicom preko ljeta, odlučio je ostati u Trebinju jer je tu pronašao svoj mir, ali i posao. On je, naime, jedan od najvećih uzgajivača jabuka i trešanja na ovom području, od čega izdržava svoje sedmero djece. Tatjana je doktor nauka iz oblasti mikrobiologije koja je u Zagrebu pokrenula ordinaciju za biorezonancu kojom pomaže brojnim ljudima da dovedu svoj organizam u prirodni balans. Oni nam govore o svom poimanju vlastitog identiteta i specifičnim kvalitetima života u Zagrebu i Trebinju

programme.title: Većina počinje ovdje
programme.desc: Film prati šest mladih ljudi iz bivših jugoslovenskih republika dok putujući regionom istražuju uticaj ratova s kraja prošlog vijeka na njihove živote i budućnost
